item.title: Johnathan add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by John Grisham
item.description: "Don't compromise yourself - you're all you have." -- John Grisham

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "There are books of which the backs and covers are by far the best parts." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by charles dickens
item.description: "To conceal anything from those to whom I am attached, is not in my nature. I can never close my lips where I have opened my heart." -- charles dickens

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Johnathan add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "The ache for home lives in all of us. The safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned." -- Maya Angelou
